title: Hero MotoCorp to raise prices of two-wheelers by up to Rs 1,500 from December 1
description: "The upward revision of the prices of our motorcycles and scooters has been necessitated due to overall inflationary costs," Hero MotoCorp Chief Financial Officer Niranjan Gupta said. The company will continue to provide innovative financing solutions in order to cushion the impact on the customers, he added.
